name: Investview
short_description: Investview, Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides access to financial education, market research, and technology for individuals.
long_description: Investview, Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides access to financial education, market research, and technology for individuals. Its services include basic financial educational, expense and debt reduction tools, research, and newsletter alerts, as well as live education rooms that includes instruction on the subjects of equities, options, Forex, ETFs, binary options, crowdfunding, and the cryptocurrency market. The company also offers education and software applications to assist individuals in debt reduction, enhanced savings, budgeting, and proper tax management; delivers automated trading strategies to individuals; and owns proprietary technologies, which includes FIREFAN, a social app for sports enthusiasts. The company was formerly known as Global Investor Services, Inc. and changed its name to Investview, Inc. in March 2012. Investview, Inc. is headquartered in Eatontown, New Jersey.
